title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running LLMs locally with a built-in model library and simple CLI/API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, push models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM & Embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting and conversation management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI code completions via Ollama models.

title: ollama-nvidia
summary: Merged PR adding official Docker image with CUDA/Nvidia runtime support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service for CI pipelines.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with async streaming and model management.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal example repo showing RAG with Ollama, LangChain & Chroma local vector DB.
